JoozdLog alpha test nl.joozd.logbookapp.PREFERENCE_FILE_KEY App Link intent Filter FlightNumber Date Airport Name Aircraft Search Search Type Continue Skip Retry Clear Add Flight Edit Flight Destination Origin Time Out Time In Name PIC Other names Remarks Simulator Time PICus Simulator PIC Save IFR Dual Instructor Username Email address for login link Email address Not an email address Repeat Email address Please enter your email for backup and account recovery purposes.\nYour email address will not be stored outside your phone. Auto Values Takeoff day night departure arrival alt: %1$s\' Landing Autoland Total Times Edit Aircraft Unknown Unknown Airport Co-pilot Paper Logbook Search Names Name Add This Remove last Select Search Airports Set This Times Times / Functions Augmented crew Crew Size Landing in seat Takeoff or landing in seat Minutes for takeoff/landing DUAL Augmented Saved flight Deleted flight Undo New Flight Registration Registrations Signature PF Sim Sign Save to PDF> Syncing Flights… SearchAircraft Loading Airports Sign in Password "••••••••" New User Landings Takeoffs/Landings ➔ Settings Error Never Always Warning Dismiss Times per year Last 12 Months Log In INSTRUCTOR Done! Create cloud sync account Almost done! Working… You are entering a custom airport. If you do not enter lat/long coordinates (TODO: NOT IMPLEMENTED IN THIS VERSION), automatic night time errors might occur.\n(You are reminded in Edit Flight screen by (!) next to airport identifier) Found locally Found in Flights Different types found for this registration Type entered by other users Type match from server Unknown registration, please select a type Unknown File The file youare trying to import into Joozdlog is not supported yet. If you want it to be, please mail it to joozdlog@joozd.nl and if I feel like it I might support it in a future version. Total time cannot be more than offblocks to on blocks Could not parse total time Cannot connect to server You need an internet connection for this. Cannot connect to server The server cannot be reached. It may be down, or your internet may have problems. Please try again later. Login Error Changed password Your password has changed. Please send your login link to yourself to make sure it is saved. Send it to myself Pick an app: Cannot log in to server. Waiting for server Created account %1$s. A login link has been placed on your clipboard. Paste it into an email or text message to send it to yourself!\nYou can also create a login link from the settings menu. I strongly suggest you do as it\'s your only way in if you lose your phone! No internet connection available. You can create and account in the settings screen when you have one, or you can connect to the internet now and retry. Server seems to be unavailable. Please retry to create an account at a later time via the settings menu. Cannot connect to server. Login data has been stored but not checked with server. Password cannot be empty Username cannot be empty Does not match Wrong username or password Password requirements At least 6 characters, two of which are not the same. Password does not meet standards. It needs a length of at least 6 and at least 2 different characters. Password does not meet standards. This username is already taken. If this is you, use your login link if you have it, or create a new account. No email No working email address was entered. I recommend you enter your email so a login link can be sent. Your email will not be stored outside your phone and will not be used for anything else. I don\'t care This username exists, and you have entered the correct password for it. If this is not you, please pick another username and a more secure password. If your login is still working on this device, you can change it to something you catually can remember via the settings screen, or you can generate a login link. Use this Calendar Sync conflict You are editing a planned flight while calendar sync is enabled. This means all changes will be gone by next sync. Do you want to disable calendar syncing until after this flight? You are trying to delete a COMPLETED flight. This might be illegal. Delete anyway? You are deleting a a flight from your calendar. Do you want to disable calendar import? Until end of flight You can start calendar synchronizing again by re-enabling it in the Settings menu Postpone on conflict Use IATA airports identifiers Use ICAO airports identifiers Get planned flights from your device\'s calendar Use Calendar Sync Calendar Sync hallon aub!(grgr)\n\nWelcome to Joozdlog Early Access.\n\nThe next few screens will allow you to set some preferences and make a Cloud account if you want to.!\n\nIf you have any feedback or bugreports, the main menu has a Feedback function.\n\nEnjoy! Sync your data to the cloud!\nThis is not a backup, read terms&conditions.\nInactive accounts can be removed. Read Terms&Conditions Accept Terms&Conditions If you already have a cloud account, you can leave this unchecked and use your login link after all settings are done! If you want to adjust any more settings, take a look at the Settings menu after you click "done"! Edit Flight You can edit your flights here. The triangles are buttons, click them to see what they do!\nYou can long-press any field to see if it offers any help. Permission needed. Joozdlog needs permission to access calendars if you want it to access your calendars. The date of this flight, in UTC. If your flight spans across multiple days, enter the date of departure. The flightnumber of this flight. Not required, will not end up in pdf logbook. The place of departure. You can enter ICAO and IATA identifiers such as EHGG, GRQ or E25 The place of arrival. You can enter ICAO and IATA identifiers such as EHGG, GRQ or E25 The time of departure, in UTC. You can enter times like 0103, 22:33 or 12 which wil become 00:12Z The time of arrival, in UTC. If earlier than Time Out, it will be read on the next day. The aircraft used on this flight. You can enter partial registrations such as XO if you mean PH-EXO. It will take the top hit in the drop-down list that will appear after entering 2 letters.\nIf the registration is not known by you or the server, you will get to a dialog where you can assign a type to this registration. Takeoffs and landings. Enter for example 1 for 1 takeoff/landing, or 2/0 if you did 2 takeoffs and 0 landings. Name of the PIC, required by EASA-FCL. Names of other crew members. Not required.\nYou can enter multiple names, separated by semicolons. Remarks. Will end up in pdf logbook. Select if this is a simulator session. Select if you want a signature in your pdf logbook. Select if this is a dual instruction flight. Select if this you want to log this flight as instructor. Select if this flight was conducted under IFR. Select if you are pilot in command or PICUS on this flight. There is no distinction between those in an EASA-FCL logbook. Select if you were pilot flying on this flight. If this box is ticked, IFR and night times will be automatically calculated from other inserted data. Add Balance Forward Name of old logbook Multipilot time Total time Total time of flight Day ldg Night ldg Night time IFR time PIC (+ PICUS) Co-pilot time Dual time Instructor time Balance Forward You are loading a roster file, but calendar sync is enabled. Do you want to disable calendar sync until end of this roster? Due to reasons, a backup can only be loaded onto a fresh install (or at least an install with no unplanned flights in it). This is on the list to be fixed in a future update. Please remove and reinstall app and try again. Receiving data Reading file getting flights from roster Removing old flights Inserting new flights Writing data to storage XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX Repeat password Already have an account? Sign in Sign out Don\'t forget to save your new login link! If something goes wrong and the new login link doesn\'t work (like when app gets killed halfway), you should be able to log in with the old link. So make sure you have that saved before continuing. Make a new account Skip this step Don\'t want to use cloud sync? Create new account You are signed in as %1$s. Your login credentials arer no longer valid. You can use your login link, or make a new account in the Settings menu. No email address provided You need to be signed in before you can perform this action. I accept the terms and conditions You must accept the terms and conditions to use Cloud Sync Don\'t lose your password. You cannot restore it. Cloud Sync terms About Joozdlog Calendar Import You can import flights from your device\'s calendar. This will look for entries like \"KL1234 AMS-LCY" in whatever calendar you pick. Apart from these entries, none of your calendar contents are being saved or transmitted. Do you want to enable this? Use Calendar Import Accept Terms and Use Cloud Sync Only use WiFi for larger files Cloud Sync Add remark when Monthly Overview has changes Add names to flights if found Synchronize flights across multiple devices or easily migrate to a new device Last synchronized at: %1$s Disabled until %1$s %1$s days Enable now Import settings Monthly Overviews, rosters and check-in sheets import supported for selected carriers (currently only KLC/KLM) only. Just share your PDF/CSV/TXT with Joozdlog. General preferences pertaining to (automatic) logging and times. Use Aircraft Consensus Data JoozdLog Cloud collects (anonymous) Aircraft Registration and type data so you don\'t have to enter aircraft types that somebody else already entered. Typical collected data would be \"4 users said PH-XXX is a Cessna 172\". Switching this off will stop sending and receiving this data. Display airports with their IATA identifier ("AMS") if this is switched on, or with their ICAO identifier ("EHAM") if it is off. Name needs to be set If no names are set on a completed flight, flight will be marked as incomplete Signed in as
%1$s  Email address
%1$s  Email address
%1$s (not verified)  Not signed in Augmented Crew takeoff/landing time
%1$s minutes  Remind me to make a backup every
%1$s  Send backup emails from cloud An email with your logbook will be emailed to you at the same interval as you get reminded to make a backup. You will still be reminded if server cannot be reached. Cloud Backup Backup now Pick backup interval In case of an augmented crew (3 or more pilots), Joozdlog calculates the time that can be logged for copilots by subtracting this amount of time for each takeoff and landing, allocating the remaining time evenly over the pilots, then adds this time again for every takeoff/landing performed in the pilot\'s seat. Change Login Link Copy login link Login link copied to clipboard! Joozdlog Login Link This will create a login link that you can paste in your favorite app (email, sms, notepad, anywhere). If you click that link, it will try to log you in with the username/password currently set on this device. You can use this screen to change your password when you think your login link might have been compromised. A new login link will be created for you to save in your favorite app. New Password Logging Preferences Backup Preferences You should periodically backup your logbook. •••••••••• You have not backed up your logbook for %1$s days. Send a periodic email to yourself from the cloud. Your email address is not saved on the server, so backups will be initiated from this device (and stop if you uninstall or kill the app, they should run with the app in the background). Please enter your email address here. It is only used to help you keep access to your data.\nYour email address will not be saved outside your device. You can give any feedback you have to Joozdlog here. I would especially be happy to read things that nag you when using the app, feature requests or compliments. Check known issues/plans here Feedback Optional contact info (phone/email/etc) All feedback will be read, and I will do my best to answer but I might be too busy/lazy. Privacy All text entered in this screen will end up in an email to me and may be stored in my inbox untill I delete it manually. It will not be saved anywehere else, and nothing will be used for any other purpose than processing/answering your feedback. You can also send an email Submit Submit feedback? Feedback is empty You cannot submit empty feedback. Issues / TODO
